data.title: [Street portrait of Bhumibol Adulyadej and Sirikit]
meta_keywords: Education - Colleges and Universities - University of North Texas
University of North Texas. College of Music.
Economics and Finance - Service Industries - Photography
data.meta_description: Photograph of a car passing a street portrait of Bhumibol Adulyadej and Sirikit, the King and Queen of Thailand. The monument consists of a large photograph of the couple framed by ornate detailing and statues of the Buddha.
data.text:
Description

Photograph of a car passing a street portrait of Bhumibol Adulyadej and Sirikit, the King and Queen of Thailand. The monument consists of a large photograph of the couple framed by ornate detailing and statues of the Buddha.

Physical Description

1 photograph : digital, col.

Creation Information

Context

This photograph is part of the collection entitled: College of Music Marketing Collection and was provided by the UNT Libraries Special Collections to The Portal to Texas History, a digital repository hosted by the UNT Libraries. More information about this photograph can be viewed below.

Named Person

Person who is significant in some way to the content of this photograph. Additional names may appear in Subjects below.

Kitiyakara, Sirikit

Audiences

Check out our Resources for Educators Site! We've identified this photograph as a primary source within our collections. Researchers, educators, and students may find this photograph useful in their work.
